mapper.sql: id, temp_no, temp_addr, channel_no,channel, stake_mark_up, stake_mark_down, stake_mark_left, stake_mark_right, cu_id,sb_id, create_time, `operator`
mapper.select: select its.id as id, ssb.small_sb_no as smallNo, its.temp_no as tempNo, its.channel_no as channelNo, its.channel as channel, ssb.is_alert as cuAddr from inner_temp_sensor its LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin ssb on ssb.id = its.sb_id LEFT JOIN control_unit cu on its.cu_id=cu.id where cu.`name` = #{device_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and its.channel = #{ch,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select its.* from inner_temp_sensor its left join small_storage_bin ssb on ssb.id=its.sb_id WHERE ssb.is_calculate='1' and TRIM(its.channel_no)!=''
mapper.insert: insert into inner_temp_sensor (id, temp_no, temp_addr, channel_no,channel, stake_mark_up, stake_mark_down, stake_mark_left, stake_mark_right, cu_id,sb_id, create_time, `operator`) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tempNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tempAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stakeMarkUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stakeMarkDown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stakeMarkLeft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stakeMarkRight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update inner_temp_sensor
temp_no = #{tempNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
temp_addr = #{tempAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stake_mark_up = #{stakeMarkUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stake_mark_down = #{stakeMarkDown,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stake_mark_left = #{stakeMarkLeft,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stake_mark_right = #{stakeMarkRight,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sb_id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update inner_temp_sensor set temp_no = #{tempNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, temp_addr = #{tempAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_no = #{channelNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stake_mark_up = #{stakeMarkUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stake_mark_down = #{stakeMarkDown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stake_mark_left = #{stakeMarkLeft,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stake_mark_right = #{stakeMarkRight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cu_id = #{cuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sb_id = #{sbId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `operator` = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select its.id as id, ssb.small_sb_no as smallNo, its.temp_no as tempNo, its.channel_no as channelNo, its.channel as channel, ssb.is_alert as cuAddr from inner_temp_sensor its LEFT JOIN small_storage_bin ssb on ssb.id = its.sb_id where its.cu_id = #{cuId} and TRIM(its.channel)!='' and ssb.is_calculate='1'

select i.id as id, ssb.small_sb_no as smallNo, scs.scs_no as fkzNo, cb.cb_no as kzxNo, cu.cu_addr as cuAddr, i.temp_no as tempNo, i.temp_addr as tempAddr, i.channel_no as channelNo, i.channel as channel, i.stake_mark_up as stakeMarkUp, i.stake_mark_down as stakeMarkDown, i.stake_mark_left as stakeMarkLeft, i.stake_mark_right as stakeMarkRight, i.create_time as createTime, i.operator as operator from inner_temp_sensor i left join control_unit cu on i.cu_id=cu.id left join control_box cb on cu.cb_no=cb.id left join sub_control_station scs on cb.scs_id=scs.id left join small_storage_bin ssb on i.sb_id=ssb.id
and ssb.id = #{smallId}

select i.id as id, ssb.small_sb_no as smallNo, scs.scs_no as fkzNo, cb.cb_no as kzxNo, cu.cu_addr as cuAddr, i.temp_no as tempNo, i.temp_addr as tempAddr, i.channel_no as channelNo, i.channel as channel, i.stake_mark_up as stakeMarkUp, i.stake_mark_down as stakeMarkDown, i.stake_mark_left as stakeMarkLeft, i.stake_mark_right as stakeMarkRight, i.create_time as createTime, i.operator as operator from inner_temp_sensor i left join control_unit cu on i.cu_id=cu.id left join control_box cb on cu.cb_no=cb.id left join sub_control_station scs on cb.scs_id=scs.id left join small_storage_bin ssb on i.sb_id=ssb.id where i.id in
#{id}
